title: What techniques are used in Quantum Psi?
first_phrase: The last part of this extensive text explores various techniques of Quantum Psi (c), a four-day program in Torino, Italy that focuses on emotional deconstruction. The section starts with an explanation of physical quantum techniques, such as light, magnetic steps, and Hara stimulation, and moves on to discuss the importance of communication and empathy in Quantum Psi. The use of hypnomentalism and clairvoyance in increasing sensitivity is also explained, followed by an overview of the polyvagal theory, postural triad, and polarization. The text concludes with techniques for coping with grief and the concept of time in Quantum Psi.
